title: Bug 137464 - Difficulty refreshing data preview when applying a filter on a Join dataset in chart editor's select data page
description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview is not refreshing properly. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the attached file. 2. Click on a filter with row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1. Actual result: After applying the filter, the data preview does not reflect any changes, even though the filter has an effect. Expected result: The data preview should refresh after applying a filter.
OB: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview is not refreshing properly.
EB: After applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview does not refresh to reflect the changes made by the filter.
SR: Ensure that the data preview refreshes properly when a filter is applied on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page.
